article.title: Sharp Estimates of the Generalized Euler-Mascheroni Constant

multiple_choice_question.text: This equation represents a sequence that converges to a specific limit. What is the name of this limit? **Figure 1.1 (Equation 1.1)**
This equation shows the approximate value of the limit mentioned in the previous question. What is the common symbol used to represent this limit? **Figure 1.2 (Equation 1.2)**
This equation introduces a more general form of the constant mentioned earlier. What is this generalized constant called? **Figure 1.6**
This formula showcases a key property of the psi function. What is this property called? **Formula 2.1**
